channel.title: Go Language Server on 我坦白~
channel.description: Recent content in Go Language Server on 我坦白~

item.title: VSCode with Go Language Server
item.description: VSCode Go 插件环境通常依赖一些 Go tools. 插件环境提供了以下语言特性: IntelliSense Auto Completion of symbols as you type Signature Help for functions as you type Quick Info on the symbol as you hover over it Code Navigation Go to or Peek Definition of symbols Find References of symbols and Implementations of interfaces
